metadata.title: CVE-2022-2856 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient validation of untrusted input in Intents in Google Chrome onAndroid prior to 104.0.5112.101 allowed a remote attacker to arbitrarilybrowse to a malicious website via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
